messages.content:
You are a Google Drive data generator for a workplace benchmark. Your job is to generate realistic Drive file data based on scenario information.

The output must be valid JSON matching the Drive schema with:
- files: array of {id, name, mimeType (optional), content (optional text excerpt), modifiedTime (optional)}

Generate Drive files that reflect:
- Events from sub_scenarios_expanded (core scenario events, e.g., documents, reports)
- Events from noise_scenarios (unrelated workplace files)
- Respect noise_level: 0 = minimal noise, 1 = lots of unrelated files
- Respect depth: 0 = direct/obvious files, 1 = indirect/multi-step file references

You must output ONLY valid JSON matching the schema. Do not include markdown code fences.

raw_message.content:
{
  "files": [
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_planning_outline_v1",
      "name": "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive Agenda",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-27T20:18:22Z",
      "content": "Audience: Jordan, Sam, Taylor
Timing: Friday afternoon, 60 minutes
Context: We‚Äôre approaching the 2025-11-10 Planning milestone for Mobile App Launch (MOB). This session is to finalize scope and sequencing before we move into the Development phase.

Logistics
- Tentative slot: Friday 3‚Äì4pm ET (after MOB Weekly Standup)
- Location: Zoom (see calendar invite titled "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive")
- Pre-reads:
  * MOB ‚Äì Weekly Update (Week of Nov 17)
  * MOB-101 JIRA ticket
  * Performance snapshot export from analytics dashboard

Agenda
1. Review current MOB roadmap
2. Confirm MVP scope and nice-to-haves
3. Identify tech risks for November Development window
4. Rollout risks if we slip the November Development milestone
5. Assign owners for open questions

Notes
- This agenda will be refined based on feedback from Taylor‚Äôs DM and the latest weekly report."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_weekly_report_mob_2025_11_23",
      "name": "MOB ‚Äì Weekly Update (Week of Nov 17)",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-23T14:05:17Z",
      "content": "MOB ‚Äì Weekly Update (Week of Nov 17)
Owner: Alex Smith

Highlights

1) Performance
We rolled out the first round of startup optimizations on Android. Average cold start time is down roughly 15% compared to last week (from ~2.0s to ~1.7s). This puts us much closer to the target we set for the initial launch.

Source: Internal analytics export "exp_mob_perf_2025_11_22" (Mobile App Launch dashboard).

2) Early Usage
Early adopter traffic continues to trend in the right direction. Daily active users on the beta build are up about 10% week-over-week, driven primarily by the new onboarding experiment.

3) Risks / Next Week
The main risk is around the remaining edge cases in MOB-101. Engineering is confident we can land the remaining work before we hit the Planning milestone, but it will be tight.

Next Steps
- Use these numbers as context for the upcoming MOB planning deep dive on Friday afternoon.
- Ensure MOB-101 risks are explicitly covered in the planning agenda doc."
    },
    {
      "id": "sheet_mob_perf_snapshot_2025_11_22",
      "name": "MOB Performance Snapshot ‚Äì 2025-11-22",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.spreadsheet",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-22T19:11:05Z",
      "content": "This spreadsheet was exported from the internal analytics dashboard for the Mobile App Launch (MOB) and is referenced in the weekly update doc.

Summary (Week-over-Week):
- Avg app startup time (cold, Android) before: 2000 ms
- Avg app startup time (cold, Android) after: 1700 ms
- Improvement: 15%

- Daily active users (beta) before: 10,000
- Daily active users (beta) after: 11,000
- Growth: 10%

Notes:
- Export ID: exp_mob_perf_2025_11_22
- Generated by: Alex Smith
- Intended use: leadership weekly report and context for planning deep dive."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_roadmap_milestones",
      "name": "Mobile App Launch ‚Äì Milestones & Timeline",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-20T16:30:00Z",
      "content": "Mobile App Launch (MOB) ‚Äì Milestones & Timeline

Key Milestones
- Planning: 2025-11-10
- Development: 2025-11-20
- Launch: 2025-11-30

Notes
- The upcoming "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive" meeting (currently targeted for Friday 3‚Äì4pm ET) will finalize scope for the Launch milestone.
- See agenda doc "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive Agenda" for the detailed discussion plan.
- Core risk item: MOB-101 (Mobile App Launch - Core Feature) is still In Progress and will be a focus topic in the planning sync."
    },
    {
      "id": "doc_mob_101_spec",
      "name": "MOB-101 ‚Äì Core Feature Functional Spec",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-21T21:12:00Z",
      "content": "MOB-101 ‚Äì Mobile App Launch Core Feature ‚Äì Functional Specification

JIRA: MOB-101 (status: In Progress)

Context
This document describes the core feature required for the Mobile App Launch (MOB). Progress and remaining risks on MOB-101 are highlighted in the weekly update doc and will be reviewed in the upcoming MOB planning deep dive.

Related Docs
- "MOB ‚Äì Weekly Update (Week of Nov 17)" ‚Äì summarizes current risk and performance metrics.
- "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive Agenda" ‚Äì includes a section to identify tech risks and rollout implications if Development milestones slip.

Implementation Notes
[...truncated spec content...]"
    },
    {
      "id": "note_mob_planning_selfnote",
      "name": "Notes ‚Äì Friday MOB Planning Sync",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.document",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-25T16:02:31Z",
      "content": "Self-note (Alex Smith)

Goal: 60-min MOB planning sync this Friday.
Ideal attendees: Jordan (impl details), Sam (architecture), Taylor (overall eng capacity/risks).

Based on Slack thread in #mob-app (ts: 1732541863.001000):
- Jordan: free after 3pm ET
- Sam: prefers 3‚Äì4pm ET
- Taylor: can do 3‚Äì4pm ET after standup

So 3‚Äì4pm ET Friday is the best common slot.

Next steps:
- Send calendar invite titled "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive" for Friday 3‚Äì4pm ET with Zoom link.
- Attach / link: current MOB milestone doc, weekly update, and planning agenda once drafted."
    },
    {
      "id": "slides_mob_planning_deck_v1",
      "name": "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive Deck",
      "mimeType": "application/vnd.google-apps.presentation",
      "modifiedTime": "2025-11-27T21:00:00Z",
      "content": "Slide 1 ‚Äì Title
"MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive"
Friday 3‚Äì4pm ET ¬∑ Zoom
Attendees: Alex, Jordan, Sam, Taylor

Slide 2 ‚Äì Context
- Mobile App Launch (MOB)
- Planning milestone: 2025-11-10
- Development milestone: 2025-11-20
- Launch milestone: 2025-11-30

Slide 3 ‚Äì Recent Metrics (from weekly update / dashboard export)
- Startup performance: ~15% improvement (2.0s ‚Üí 1.7s)
- Beta DAUs: ~10% week-over-week growth

Slide 4 ‚Äì Risks
- MOB-101 remaining work and edge cases
- Rollout risks if Development milestone slips (requested by Taylor)

Note: Deck follows the structure in "MOB ‚Äì Planning Deep Dive Agenda" and uses numbers from "MOB ‚Äì Weekly Update (Week of Nov 17)" and the performance snapshot sheet."
    }
  ]
}
